org.gvsig.educa.portableview.app.editor

Interface PortableViewEditorManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPortableViewEditorManager

    public interface PortableViewEditorManager

    Manager which make easy the creation, editing and share PortableView

    This uses all services of PortableViewManager and PortableViewSwingManager in a high level way.

    This manager provides the most important services which provides this add-on

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Compile a PortableViewCompilation and deploy it in current install folder ( PortableViewManager.getInstallationMapFolder() )

      Create a new PortableView from a view contents and open it as a PortableViewDocument PortableViewDocument will be linked to source view so it can be regenerated.

      Export the contents of a Portable View into a folder and create a ViewDocument in project with it's layers User will be prompted for extract folder If Portable view document has no related view link the new one to it
